programme.title: Laureus World Sports Awards 2023
programme.desc: The Laureus World Sports Awards is an annual award ceremony honouring individuals and teams from the world of sports along with sporting achievements throughout the year.

programme.title: India Unplated S1
programme.desc: We finally have an episode this season with a dessert special. Diwali to India is what Christmas is to Australia with colourful celebrations abound. And no celebration in India is complete without food so in today's episode we share recipes that are made especially for Diwali. Adam kicks off this episode with his version of carrot halwa followed by Helly's Kalakand and Sandeep's quick and easy Rasmalai.

programme.title: Building Giants S3
programme.desc: See the race to build the world's next generation of engineering wonders in this award-winning series.

programme.title: Celebrity Wheel Of Fortune S2
programme.desc: Various celebrities compete against each other by solving word puzzles in order to win cash prizes that are determined by a spinning wheel.

programme.title: Serengeti S2
programme.desc: The Emmy-nominated series returns to capture the dramatic and emotional stories of iconicsavannah animals once again. There's humour, heartbreak and nail-biting tension as new characters move in and familiar faces continue their stories. This time they are not only facing their own personal challenges. Their whole world will soon be in crisis. As the programme opens, a spectacular buffalo hunt exposes the growing tensions within Kali's pride.

programme.title: Slugterra S1
programme.desc: Slugterra is an epic sci-fi comedy adventure set deep underground, where the ammo's alive and only the quick survive! In this luminous, high-tech, underground world every cavern holds a new adventure, new battle and weird little slugs to be discovered!

programme.desc: The adventures of average suburban boy Johnny Test, who wittingly plays test subject for his genius twin sisters' various experiments, reluctantly fighting evil villains in the process.

programme.title: Sunshine Station
programme.desc: Jimmy and Jenny run a very special bus station - the Sunshine Station! It isn't just a place you go to get to a destination. It is a destination in itself - a destination of endless fun, songs, dances, discovery and wonders! At the Sunshine Station, pre-schoolers embark on a learning journey to discover the world around them by going to various interesting locations around Singapore.

programme.title: Dora And Friends: Into The City S2
programme.desc: Dora, a young girl, starts going to school in the city of Playa Verde. Along with her friends, Kate, Naiya, Emma, Alana and Pablo, Dora embarks on various adventures to explore the city.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: Everyone in Ollipolis is making presents for each other to exchange during the holidays. The Imp, who's feeling jealous and left out from the gift-giving, decides to steal them all for himself. Ollie and the gang get a new pet! But in trying to take care of all 3 pets, Ollie has no time to spend with Rover. Rover thinks that Ollie doesn't care about him and decides to run away from home.

programme.title: GUS The Itsy Bitsy Knight
programme.desc: Follow small, grasshopper-sized boy named Gus who wishes to become the greatest knight in all the kingdom of Karamel! Armed with his laser sword and mounted on his electric pony, Gus will never miss an opportunity to pursue adventure and win the day.

programme.desc: A new species of Transformers must find their place and purpose among Autobots, Decepticons, and the human family who adopts them.

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: Mount Emily: Guardians Of The Crystal
programme.desc: In 1819, Baba teaches his Students invisibility and the responsibility that comes with it. In 1989, Patsy and Elena form an unexpected friendship during the highly competitive Sports Day. But suspicions from everyone around them grows.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Bargain Hunters
programme.desc: From DIY renovation for just $5,000 to furniture steals, host Das DD picks up tips from savvy homeowners who have hacked their way to huge savings while glamming up their new digs.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: Reusable water bottles have been trending on social media and growing in popularity. They help us stay healthy by keeping us hydrated while we are on the go. But could your bottle be harboring dangerous mold and bacteria that could harm you? Steven Chia sends some bottles to the lab, to find out if our reusable water bottles are as clean as we think they are.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Arjun visits Chris in prison and offers words of encouragement. Ismail tells Ali that he's going after Salmah, much to Ali's displeasure. Sulaiman worries as Norleena flip-flops on her business ideas and Zul decides to intervene.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It S2
programme.desc: Master builder and household favourite Tommy Walsh is joined by expert pro cleaner Maxine Dwyer and creative carpenter Asher Edwards, as they meet people across the UK who are struggling with household chaos, grime and clutter. Much more than a makeover show, our dynamic professionals provide real-life, practical solutions, invaluable tips and insider tricks to give viewers brilliant take-away ideas for bettering their own living spaces.

programme.title: The Chefs' Line S2
programme.desc: Every top restaurant has a line of chefs leading to the top, from the Commis chef to the Head chef. This celebratory cooking competition pitches at-home cooking enthusiasts against professionals, starting at the bottom and working their way up. Can they beat their way to the top of The Chef's Line?

programme.title: Press Your Luck S2
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.desc: All new season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.desc: Contestants compete against a professional quizzer, known as the Chaser, whose aim is to prevent the contestants from winning a cash prize. Hosted by Sara Haines.

programme.desc: The Heng family goes for their second therapy session. Hafiq gets a sponsorship and Khatijah struggles to share his enthusiasm.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Future Proof
programme.desc: It's Alan's birthday. It turns out to be the worst day of his life when his girlfriend Ariel announces she's pregnant and he receives news of his estranged father Seng Lee's death - his father whom he believed died years ago. Alan inherits Seng Lee's personal effects, including a vintage date stamp, which unexpectedly transports Alan back in time to 1965, where he gets to meet his father for the first time.

programme.title: The Last Bout
programme.desc: In the early 1920s, Louis and Tommy, two young boys in Great Depression-era Singapore, bond over their admiration for boxing and its latest star Jackie Mason. While Louis contends with his abusive father, Tommy struggles with family poverty. When a new boxing ring and cabaret called Golden World is built, both boys jump at the chance to watch Jackie Mason live. Louis eventually musters up the courage to leave his troubled home, and embark on a new dream to become a professional boxer.

programme.title: 至尊红颜
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 豪门贾家内部暗流汹涌。三女增金 (陈丽贞) 因丈夫奇才 (黄奕良) 而被卷入命案，并与侄子若其 (许立桦) 反目成仇。她害死两条人命后被赶出家门，儿子玉其 (张向晖) 也被诬告入狱。贾家媳妇曦怡 (范文芳) 也与四女增银陷入三角关系的情爱纠纷被迫离去，最后情场失足。孙女婿仲贤 (曹国辉) 加入贾家金乐集团后，就把它占为己有。曦怡、增金、若其三人后来重聚，觉悟己非，才找出了命案真凶，奇才父子含冤得雪。曦怡和增金回归贾家，把仲贤逼出家族企业。金乐最终虽难逃解体命运，却换来一家人融洽的相处.

programme.desc: (重) 美国航天局开创的冷冻干燥保存技术，能让食物保存好几年。此外，为了保障食品供应，科学家也正在研发一种高度可持续，需要极少可耕地、水和其他资源的原料－Solein。Solein可以用来制成蛋白质食品，如植物肉、豆腐、乳酪和果酱，而这种原料的主要成分遍布整个地球，那就是二氧化碳。一家建设中的工厂，预计每年生产一百吨的solein。.
